title: An American in Paris
oscars_won_details: Best Music, Scoring of a Musical Picture
description: Three friends struggle to find work in Paris. Things become more complicated when two of them fall in love with the same woman.

title: A Streetcar Named Desire
description: Disturbed Blanche DuBois moves in with her sister in New Orleans and is tormented by her brutish brother-in-law while her reality crumbles around her.

title: The African Queen
description: In WWI East Africa, a gin-swilling riverboat captain is persuaded by a strait-laced missionary to use his boat to attack an enemy warship.

title: The Day the Earth Stood Still
description: An alien lands in Washington, D.C. and tells the people of Earth that they must live peacefully or be destroyed as a danger to other planets.

title: Strangers on a Train
description: A psychotic socialite confronts a pro tennis star with a theory on how two complete strangers can get away with murder—a theory that he plans to implement.

title: Alice in Wonderland
description: Alice stumbles into the world of Wonderland. Will she get home? Not if the Queen of Hearts has her way.

title: A Place in the Sun
oscars_won_details: Best Music, Scoring of a Dramatic or Comedy Picture
description: A poor boy gets a job working for his rich uncle and ends up falling in love with two women.

title: The Thing from Another World
description: Scientists and American Air Force officials fend off a bloodthirsty alien organism while at a remote arctic outpost.

title: Quo Vadis
description: After twenty years, General Marcus Vinicius returns to Rome to find the Emperor Nero, a madman, and the woman he loves, a Christian.

title: Ace in the Hole
description: A frustrated former big-city journalist now stuck working for an Albuquerque newspaper exploits a story about a man trapped in a cave to rekindle his career, but the situation quickly escalates into an out-of-control circus.

title: The Lavender Hill Mob
description: A meek bank clerk who oversees the shipment of bullion joins with an eccentric neighbor to steal gold bars and smuggle them out of the country as miniature Eiffel Towers.

title: Scrooge
description: Ebenezer Scrooge, a curmudgeonly, miserly businessman, has no time for sentimentality and largely views Christmas as a waste of time. However, this Christmas Eve he will be visited by three spirits who will show him the errors of his ways.

title: The Man in the White Suit
description: An altruistic chemist invents a fabric which resists wear and stain as well as never needing to be cleaned, but the government and the textile industry try to suppress it.

title: Show Boat
description: The daughter of a riverboat captain falls in love with a charming gambler, but their marriage is threatened by his gambling and her parents' disapproval.

title: Detective Story
description: A fanatical detective finds his moral absolutism challenged when his wife is implicated in an abortionist's business.

title: Royal Wedding
description: A brother and sister dance act encounter challenges and romance when invited to London to perform at the time of the Royal Wedding.

title: The Great Caruso
description: A biography of the Italian tenor Enrico Caruso, following his rise from a poor background to international stardom.

title: The River
description: Three young women in Bengal, India fall for a soldier who is recovering from the war.

title: Decision Before Dawn
description: In the final days of World War II, a German POW agrees to spy for the Americans to help end the war faster.

title: Captain Horatio Hornblower R.N.
description: During the Napoleonic Wars, a British naval captain has adventures in Central American waters.

title: When Worlds Collide
description: As a new star flies toward Earth on a collision course, a small group of survivalists prepare a rocket ship to escape.

title: The Red Badge of Courage
description: A young soldier in the Union Army fights fear and cowardice to find his courage during the Civil War.

title: Pandora and the Flying Dutchman
description: A beautiful singer in 1930s Spain meets a mysterious yachtsman who is actually the Flying Dutchman, doomed to sail the seas for eternity.

title: Westward the Women
description: A wagon master leads a wagon train of women from Chicago to California to marry the men of a small town.

title: The Browning Version
description: Forced to retire from an English public school, an unpopular professor must confront the failure of his life and career.

title: People Will Talk
description: A physician falls in love with a young woman who is pregnant with another man's child, but his past comes back to haunt him.

title: Flying Leathernecks
description: A Marine Major leads a squadron of pilots during the Battle of Guadalcanal, but his strict disciplinary style causes conflict with his executive officer.

title: Rawhide
description: Four escaped convicts take a stagecoach station employee and a young woman hostage.

title: On Moonlight Bay
description: A tomboy falls for the boy next door, but her father disapproves of the romance.

title: Bellissima
description: A working-class mother in Rome drags her young daughter to Cinecittà to audition for a role in a new film.

title: Miracle in Milan
description: An orphan adopts a colony of shantytown dwellers in Milan and protects them from a greedy landowner.

title: Miss Julie
description: A young noblewoman begins a romance with her father's valet.

title: The Tales of Hoffmann
description: A poet reflects on his three failed romances in this adaptation of Offenbach's opera.

title: The Desert Fox: The Story of Rommel
description: The story of Field Marshal Erwin Rommel during the final days of World War II.

title: The Blue Veil
description: A war widow devotes her life to caring for other people's children.

title: Death of a Salesman
description: A traveling salesman loses his job and struggles with his own feelings of worthlessness and his relationship with his sons.

title: Bedtime for Bonzo
description: A psychology professor tries to prove that environment determines personality by raising a chimpanzee as a human child.

title: Angels in the Outfield
description: A grumpy baseball manager gets supernatural help from an angel.

title: The Enforcer
description: A crusading district attorney finally gets a chance to prosecute the head of a Murder, Inc.-style organization.

title: Fourteen Hours
description: A police officer tries to talk a suicidal young man down from the ledge of a tall building.

title: He Ran All the Way
description: A thief on the run takes a family hostage in their own apartment.

title: The Lemon Drop Kid
description: A con man has to come up with $10,000 for a gangster by Christmas, or he won't make it to New Year's.

title: The Mating Season
description: A hamburger stand owner's son marries a socialite, and his mother ends up posing as their cook to stay close to them.

title: The Prowler
description: A police officer obsessively pursues a married woman, leading to a tragic conclusion.

title: Storm Warning
description: A traveling dress model witnesses the KKK murder a journalist in a Southern town and must decide whether to testify against them.

title: Fixed Bayonets!
description: During the Korean War, a U.S. platoon is tasked with a rear-guard action to cover a retreat, forcing a corporal to take command.

title: Across the Wide Missouri
description: A trapper in the 1830s Rockies marries a Native American woman to gain access to her tribe's land but eventually falls in love with her.

title: Double Dynamite
description: A bank teller is accused of embezzlement after he wins money gambling and saves a bookie's life.

title: His Kind of Woman
description: A gambler is deported to Mexico and becomes involved with a singer and a gangster who wants to use his identity.

title: Cry, the Beloved Country
description: In South Africa, a black minister searches the city for his son, only to find he has killed a white man who was a crusader for racial equality.
